thread.title: Trucker held in 4 slayings a serial killer, Ohio authorities say
thread.title_full: Trucker held in 4 slayings a serial killer, Ohio authorities say

title: Trucker held in 4 slayings a serial killer, Ohio authorities say
text:
Published By: Fox News - Today 
Prosecutors say a Cleveland truck driver indicted on multiple counts of aggravated murder in the slayings of four people is a serial killer....
